FuncDef: This command imports a policy to filter IGMP packets. Thenoform of the command removes the policy association from the IGMP instance.

ParaDef.Info: The import route policy name. Allowed values are any string up to 32 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed between double quotes.

ExtraInfo: Default: no import - No import policy specified.
